synopsis: The 4-koma manga Gori Papa Ikka serialized in Nihon Nougyou Shinbun (The Japan Agricultural News) reached it's 10,000th serialization on May 1, 2017. A short web animation was made in honor of it as well as in honor of the magazine's 90th anniversary.

title.jp: Gori Papa Ikka no Nougyou wa Omoshiroi
